overview: As a child, Tura, witnessed thieves to rape and kill his mother. After he buried her mother in the back garden of his home, he takes care of himself until adulthood and became a florist like his mother was. Feeling guilty for not being able to help his mother when he was a kid, Tura become a hunter rapists. When Tura falls in love with Lily, a high class prostitute, will he be able to retain he seek of revenge against Lily's powerful clients?  â€”PL
title: Lily Bunga Terakhirku
